summary: Successfully enhanced profile section with additional information

changes.description: Added 3 new information cards to the profile section
details: Added User Roles card displaying Admin, Leader, and User role badges
Added Account Information card showing account creation date and status
Added Unit Assignment card (conditional) showing personnel record link and assigned unit
Imported new hooks: useCurrentPersonnel, useUserBattalion, useUnits
Imported new icons: UserCog, Calendar, Building2
Added useMemo optimization for unit info, account date, and role badges

changes.description: Added translation keys for new profile fields
details: English: Added common.notAvailable, common.linked, and profile.* keys
Hebrew: Added corresponding translations for all new keys

issuesFixed: Profile section now shows comprehensive user information instead of just email
Users can see their assigned roles (Admin, Leader, User)
Account creation date is displayed in locale-aware format
Unit assignment is visible for personnel with linked records
All new cards maintain responsive design for narrow screens
